IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviScope Specific Instrument Driver

Class Specification version: 4.1
IVI Generation: IVI-2014
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base                    = Supported
Interpolation		    = Not Supported
TVTrigger		        = Not Supported
RuntTrigger		        = Supported
GlitchTrigger		    = Not Supported
WidthTrigger		    = Supported
ACLineTrigger		    = Not Supported
WaveformMeasurement	    = Supported
MinMaxWaveform		    = Supported
ProbeAutoSense		    = Supported
ContinuousAcquisition	= Supported
AverageAcquisition	    = Supported
SampleMode		        = Not Supported
TriggerModifier		    = Supported
AutoSetup		        = Supported


Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking	  = True
State Caching		 	      = True
Coercion Recording 		      = True


Driver Identification:
---------------------
Driver Revision:                1.70.49152
Prefix:                      	tkmso5x
Description:                  	Tektronix MSO5X Series Oscilloscope


Driver Release Information:
--------------------------
Original Release Date: 09/15/2017
Update Release Date:   11/06/2020


Hardware Information:
--------------------
Instrument Manufacturer:      Tektronix

Supported Instrument Models:  MSO54, MSO56, MSO58, MSO58LP, MSO64, MSO44, MSO46, LDP_64, MSO64B, MSO66B, MSO68B
Supported Bus Interfaces:     Ethernet, USB, LAN


32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (32-bit), Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (32-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)
                                          Windows 10 (32-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:              Windows 7 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 10 (64-bit)
Unsupported Operation Systems:            N/A
Support Software Required:                IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later
Source Code Availability:                 Available

Unit Testing
--------------------
Test Setup 1:

Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):
Bus Interface:                            Ethernet
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:           64-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                  NI-VISA 16.0
IVI Shared Components Version:            2.4


Driver Installation Testing:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                               64-bit


Driver Buildability:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):          Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                               64-bit

Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:
Some attributes do not implement range checking in the driver, please refer to your available materials to get these ranges.
The string control Accessory in Function Configure Probe Accessory and Unit in Function Configure External Attenuator
has no valid range, please refer to your available materials to get the range.
Note:
National Instruments has evaluated and/or tested this driver to verify that it meets all applicable requirements
of the IVI specifications at the time this compliance document was submitted to the IVI Foundation and agrees to
abide by the dispute arbitration provisions in Section 8 of IVI-1.2: Operating Procedures, if the IVI Foundation
finds this driver to be non-conformant.
